1.0.1.en: Manifest, Readme, Icons, Images, Axios instead of node-fetch for timeouts

1.0.2.en: New Action flows and other patches

1.0.3.en: Added sensors: mower height, rain sensor, charge power. Added Deutsch language

2.0.1.en: + Camera View, + Multiple Willows support, + DockStatus sensor capability, + New condition flows for Is Mowing and In EmergencyStop, + New action flows for playing sounds on Willow, + Energy fixed (shows charging power), + Bugfixes, --- Make sure to re-add your Willow as device to get all the new features ---

2.0.3.en: Fixed docking issue while manual mowing
